Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Dartmouth Swimming Alumni Archive

A web app for Dartmouth varsity swim team alumni featuring:
- Decade-based timeline for organizing photos and stories
- Contribution system for uploading memories retroactively
- Alumni invite system with email notifications
- Dartmouth branding with official D-Pine logo

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
